SCAP 1.2 Schematron Rules

The following sections detail the Schematron rules for SCAP 1.2.

SCAP Schematron Rules

The SCAP Schematron Rules are ISO Schematron rules written to check many of the requirements documented in NIST SP 800-126 Rev 2. They are for informational purposes only; they do not supercede the requirements in the specification. The rules are subject to change at anytime. Instructions on how to use the resource are provided in the included readme.txt.

Version: 1.2
Released: 06/04/2014
Download: SCAP Schematron Package
SHA-1: 34300E9310FF1F184FC494BBE21D541C25CFF6B2
SHA-256: D89D8344524534FF3FB6279ABE153E5B834D6671D517748D61849C258FBC11A6

OVAL Schematron Rules

The OVAL Schematron Rules page contains the OVAL Schematron files that are applicable to SCAP 1.2. These are provided because in limited cases the Schematron files needed to be modified from their official version (found here). All deviations from the officially released versions are documented in the readme.txt.

Version: N/A
Status: N/A
Updated: 04/08/2015
Download: OVAL Schematron Package
SHA-256: D6E868C806CD02F1DF5B6FCBAB52B51BEE69A3C95E72CA7C9C2B6CB5D895B41C
